title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
content: Up for Auction I have 2 of the 7 different Doge bars made by Big Time Spaghetti The copper bar is in better shape than what looks like in the pics - the airtite holding it is pretty scuffed up.1. Matte Silver Finish -- 20 were made (this is not the 2oz silver version)2. Glossy Copper Finish -- unknown qty Auction Terms:Auction is for 1 lot of both barsStarting Bid:  0 BTCBid Increments:  0.001 BTC please keep to 3 decimal placesAuction Ends:  Tuesday, 07 March 2023 @ 3pm ESTSniping:  A bid in the final 10 minutes adds 10 minutes to the end of the auction time, this continues until no bid has been made for 10 minutesExcluded from Bidding:   I may exclude/disqualify bidders, or require a deposit, for any bidders at my sole discretion.  Shipping:  At cost in addition to the winning bid.  Ships from USA.  Buyer responsible for any local customs/duties. Can also be sent to minerjones for consolidated reshipping.Payment due within 24 hours of auction closing and in BTC to address: bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4es
